comment.author: 8543109@N02
comment._content: IMDB for the film. The people are probably Herbert Rawlinson and Ann Little, the stars of the film. You can see them in pictures from another film of the same time: "The Black Box" a novel posted at Project Gutenberg.

comment.author: 87914514@N00
comment._content: Hi, this photo has been discussed in one of the threads in the Flickr Commons group, and we'd love to have this added to the group pool.
